1 George Washington

1789 - 1797

Unaffiliated

Domestic:

  • Selection of permanent U.S. capital
  • Tariff of 1789
  • Hamiltonian economic program
  • Whiskey Rebellion
  • Rise of political parties
  • Constitutional amendments
  • Slavery
  • Northwest Indian War

Foreign:

  • French Revolution
    • Public debate
    • American neutrality
  • Relations with Great Britain
    • Seizures and economic retaliation
    • Jay Treaty
  • Barbary pirates
  • Relations with Spain
